body:
• Can be given in the following forms:
    • "bucket" - map over all keys in the bucket
    • [{"b1","k1"},{"b2","k2"},...] - map over each bucket/key specified
    • [{"b1","k1","data1"},...] - map over each bucket/key/data specified
  • Common to see just a bucket specified, which lists keys in the bucket (expensive)
